website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful, rustic way to enjoy your favorite homemade soup.
pros: Set includes six rustic wooden spoons
Each spoon has a smooth, shiny finish that produces a pleasing mouth feel
The extra long handle provides a balanced, comfortable grip
Spoons do not retain heat from soup like a traditional steel spoon would
cons: Wooden spoons must be hand washed

customer_reviews.title: Supper nice
customer_reviews.text: nice wooden spoons that are perfect for soup or rice. The perfect item for Korean or Japanese meals.
customer_reviews.author: wangyu

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made but...edges splint
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them for myself but my children also seem to love them as it doesn’t get hot when eating something hot. I didn’t like that we can’t throw them in the dishwasher but it’s beatifiult made and seemed to be of good quality. But after only a couple of months, the edges of the spoon is beginning to get worn and is rough. Almost sliced my lip open as it’s beginnjng to splinter off. Really sad about this as we really liked these.
customer_reviews.author: M-Sass

customer_reviews.title: Little Spoons Who Can
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I am kind of embarassed to admit this. I bought these beause I saw Chef John from foodwishes.com use something similar. He refers to the ridiculously small wooden spoon. I thought they were cute. So, I bought a set. I won't buy the matching forks. I love these and they are sturdy. They are relatively easy to clean, but watch out that you don't leave them in water. I left one in water too long and some of the finish came off. Still very usable but not as pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Tawny808

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I received such a small package but so surprised when I opened it up. The spoons are beautiful and well crafted They are about a foot long with a lovely finish. It is just as pictured. I am using mine to create a decoration but would use them in the kitchen. The one caveat: The bowl of the spoon is very thin. I would not use it for heavy kitchen work. It is very delicate and fine and it would be good for serving or even using to eat, though it is large for that. I am well pleased with them. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wooden spoons!
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute and smooth! I’m using these spoons when I’m eating yogurt.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Oh

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful
customer_reviews.text: We bought these after watching "mukbangs" and seeing people use wooden spoons. They feel great and I love the size of them. It makes eating more fun. I'd definitely buy more and would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: min2be

customer_reviews.title: 6 piece wooden spoons
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sturdy quality of these spoons. I purchased them to replace spoons I use when I cook in my nonstick pots and pans. They aren't as long as I thought they would be, but they work nicely. They have a nice smooth finish and have been hand washed several times. Shown with one teaspoon and one tablespoon.
customer_reviews.author: LYNNKS

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and functional
customer_reviews.text: To preface this review, I need to say that we were given these spoons free of charge. My wife is a mini-celebrity mom blogger, and we both contributed our thoughts to the review. The video is a promotional video from the manufacturer. Twigy: • Easy grip • Good for tossing a salad • Probably not good for stove top cooking • No artificial smells, very natural • Pleasant coloring Ryan • Handle is longer than needed • Medium size basin - I’d like it a little bigger • Pleasant wood grain and stain • Good price but bad English translation • Not recommended for the dishwasher • Sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Finish Melts off and chips
customer_reviews.text: These are awful and possibly poisonous as all of the finish melts of in your hot cooking liquid!! Update: spoon chips off into your food while using it!! How dangerous
customer_reviews.author: Ritta

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Low Price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these spoons as a little add-in for a bridal shower gift. Great quality, sturdy little spoons with a flawless, glossy, even finish and no snags, chips, or rough parts on any of them. They each came individually wrapped, and put together a cute gift worthy box. They would be the perfect size for strirring sauces/tasting. Great multipurpose spoons for a great price! I have a collection of high quality wooden spoons displayed in my kitchen and would definitely add these, they're not the cheapy looking ones you would hide in your drawer.
customer_reviews.author: KayBee

customer_reviews.title: Wooden? More like Styrofoam
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product, the description does say wooden & the price seemed to reflect it. When I recieved them, as soon as I opened up the package a moderate plastic/ ammonia smell came from it. As I pulled the spoons out from their cardboard box I noticed they were super light. They literally feel like Styrofoam painted over with wood stain. A common household metal spoon weighs more than this. I can assure that on a windy day this spoon would definitely fly away....like a turd...in the wind... The wooden stain also fades when washing not sure if these are just for decor?? Or actually meant for eating.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: When I received this order as was thrill and ready to use the spoons, but when I washed them I noticed they felt gooey, as if they where chia seeds. I kept on washing them and I even boil them for a bit bit it just wouldn't go away. I put them away until today that I was washing my new wooden spatula that I remember that I had this. Still the gooey crap won't go away, so I throw them away. So there you have it, it was a waste of money, water, soap, and money with this spoons. I definitely don't recommend them at all. I would give this a zero star, too bad I can't.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Its ohk, not the best
customer_reviews.text: I love using wooden spoons but this one chips away quite quick. I have been using it for a couple of weeks now and 3 of them are chipped at the end. It doesnt look good esp when serving guests at home. I had to switch it to a cooking spoon instead. Will not be buying again and will look for other brands. The shape and minor use of the spoon is good if thats what youre looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional!
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons. I like to use these when I'm making fried rice or when I'm stirring a small serving of soup. Although these spoons are not deep enough to be considered as "soup spoons," I still like to use them because I don't have to worry about burning my lips. These are very light weight and easy to clean. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Yi

customer_reviews.title: They are great
customer_reviews.text: They are just like the ones that I got from a Korean supermarket, but better. They are utensils for eating, not for cooking. So they are not too small. They are just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: First ever return
customer_reviews.text: These flimsy things are so not worth the money. They’re too small to cook with and too big to eat with, they’ve got this varnish coating on them that feels like cheap furniture varnish, not something I want in food. They have that not quite sticky but kind of tacky feel to them that poorly restored furniture has. I have never returned an item on Amazon before, this was a first for me.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for the SNAP!
customer_reviews.text: These wooden spoons look perfect in the pictures. But when I received them I did a double take. They are smaller and thinner than I expected. I was hoping for strong and sturdy spoons to use for mixing dough and stirring thick batters. I guess I shouldn't judge a book by its cover (yet) but I'm just waiting for them to SNAP when I start using them for heavy duty stirring jobs.
customer_reviews.author: C. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: The spoons are super light.
customer_reviews.text: I love the length and color of the spoon. Looks really classy. But was expecting a little big size spoon (not the length) Also, I'm concerned about the lightness. It shouldn't break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Zoya

customer_reviews.title: Seem sturdy enough but the spoons are really beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving them as gifts and keeping a couple for myself. Will be great for eating yogurt! Love eating off wood! Don't have a dishwasher so will be hand-washing but would purchase, even if I had a dishwasher. Really beautiful long-handles spoons!
customer_reviews.author: nica

customer_reviews.title: Brought dead appetite back to life.
customer_reviews.text: My younger sister didn't have an appetite for the longest time. When we paid a surprise visit to my grandmother, she had a wooden spoon and my sister ate with it and her appetite miraculously came back. I was so glad that she was finally eating that I took it upon myself to buy her some to use at home. These spoons are sturdy, solid, and maintain the glossed finish very well. 5 stars for bringing my sister's appetite back to life, not to mention the amazing price point.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently living aboard and I’ve become accustomed to how everyone eats. These are perfect for eating hot foods, you don’t burn your mouth on the spoon and you get a good spoonful.
customer_reviews.author: JJace

customer_reviews.title: High quality spoons at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: These are really well made spoons and a great value. They were a bit smaller than I expected but the listed sizes were accurate, so that was more about me not doing my due diligence than the spoons. These likely won't be very great for serving spoons, but are more than enough for cooking and mixing spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Groux

customer_reviews.title: High quality and beautiful color of wood and soft.
customer_reviews.text: Oh, my son was so jazzed to receive these! He cooks a lot of different Asian dishes and soups. He prefers wooden utensils and your spoons are beautiful, soft in the mout, and so reasonably priced for the high quality. I am checking out your other products for my husband and I, and hoping you have forks for our son too!
customer_reviews.author: Monique McLean

customer_reviews.title: Read the Description!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some sturdy mixing spoons. These looked great! I failed to read the description and realize how small these actually were. They’re still great quality and work good for mixing small amounts of stuff, I just wish they made some like these that were bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Wood spoons
customer_reviews.text: I like to use them for easy cooking such as oatmeal, scrambled egg etc. and eat cereals. The size is perfect. I wish the colors would be natural. Be careful it gets scratched easily. I did hand washing them, there’s some things slippery like there’s film covered. I guess it was something they used for protecting the wood.
customer_reviews.author: WaniCh

customer_reviews.title: Nice wooden spoon but...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I love the long handle, I use it for everything. I use it for eating, cooking, stirring, and even measuring. The only thing and reason why I gave it a star instead of is that when you first open it, it has a very strong and bad smell. I had to let it air out for a while and I soaked it in hot water. I mean don't know if I was suppose to or not but for only $11, eh oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Sesshomaru

customer_reviews.title: Great size for cooking
customer_reviews.text: I love these small wooden spoons! They are perfect size for cooking with, stirring etc. The quality is very good. The length of the handle is just right too. I'm really glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT J.

customer_reviews.title: Very, Very Small- Do Not buy if you are looking for a regular wooden spoon
customer_reviews.text: These are ridiculous. Will be returning immediately. I was expecting spoons that could be used for cooking and stirring- similar to any Norman wooden spoon- and these are the size of doll furniture . Completely misleading. If you are looking for a wooden spoon like others in your kitchen- stay far away from these.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Heathcott

customer_reviews.title: It's cute little spoon but not for cooking on gas top.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for preparing my baby's solid food but it's not good idea for cooking. When I put the spoon on the edge of pan, it showed the burnt line. If you are trying to use for cooking, you might want to know this.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Nicely crafted and perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are perfect if you cook for two people. I don't use huge cooking pots so don't need 16" spoons. These are perfect for smaller pots and pans (skillets and 3 quart pans). I kept three and gave three to a friend who asked me to order another set. They are well made and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Benita Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Love these wooden spoons.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty set, the spoons are so light and pretty that my kids love to use them to eat. We use them for soup, dessert, measuring spoon, cooking and everything else. Since my house has transitioned to mostly wooden utensils, these are a must. I strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons
customer_reviews.text: If you, like my household, have a strong eastern European influence and you can't find those wooden behavior correction tools that would be used to cook things with. These are a great alternative, they're equally lightweight, have a nicer finish, and are easier to clean. have not attempted to use them for behavior correction, but they smart the knuckles well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Trogdor

customer_reviews.title: soft and the color faded over time
customer_reviews.text: the color faded over time, and the spoons are made with soft wood, not a valuable product.
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: Beware of what you might find underneath varnish
customer_reviews.text: Found a piece of hair underneath the varnish after my daughter ate from it. She lost her appetite after realizing she was eating from a spoon with some stranger’s piece of hair. After finding this piece of hair, we inspected the other side of this spoon and also found another smaller piece. However, it seems out of the six, it was just one spoon that had such issues. I considered returning but its such a hassle to. We’ll just throw this one spoon out and use the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice Spoons
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these wooden spoons. The reason I purchased them is because, when I eat out of metal spoons I can taste the metal. I have no idea why that happens to me sometimes. But that’s why I switched to wooden spoons. These spoons are sturdy and are big. I love the way it looks with the wooden bowels I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Pepperina’s World

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I've never tried these spoons before. It's light, has lengthy handles, uses well, however; I don't know if it'll stand-up to a dishwasher and as a result, I've been hand washing it. For me, that's it's only down side.
customer_reviews.author: Who Da Guy

customer_reviews.title: I thought these would be bigger...
customer_reviews.text: I kind of thought these were your grandma's mixing spoons you see in the kitchen, they are not. These are more along the lines of soup spoons you'd get at an Asian bistro. Don't get me wrong, these are great utensils, and you absolutely CAN use them to mix things, but they're not what one might expect.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect. They are well made, sturdy yet light as a feather. They feel great in my hands. I bought them for everyday use and have no doubt that I’ll be using and enjoying them for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Masa

customer_reviews.title: Wooden spoons 🥄
customer_reviews.text: I love these wooden spoons. The after a while they wear out. But since they are wood, they won't last forever. Just take care of them by gently cleaning them. Dont leave them soaking in water. And once in a while, rub some olive oil on the
customer_reviews.author: Lily Chim

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: nice quality and its the perfect size for cooking as well as eating.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Arrives fast
customer_reviews.text: I love using these longer spoons. They are very light weight and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons do not scoop ice cream
customer_reviews.text: Great eating spoons NOT for scooping ice cream! I haven’t put them through the dishwasher yet and probably don’t recommend it. The wife has a sensitivity to the sound of metal on porcelain and I have a sensitivity to b!+c#ing these are awesome for the kids eating anything that requires scraping of the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: Korean Mukbang fan? These are for you.
customer_reviews.text: After watching way to many Korean Mukbang3videos I wanted wooden spoons. These had a long ha done but honestly it's not too long and I'm finding I prefer then other any other straw. They are lightweight and really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice Color and Long
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are so nice. I’ll be using them to cook with. Kind of long to use as a eating utensil but you could if you want to because that’d your business. I also love how they came individually wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Taliah

customer_reviews.title: I love my spoons.
customer_reviews.text: The spoons a very nice and smooth. Strong & great with any meal.
customer_reviews.author: E. Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful spoons
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons. They're not too big, not too small, lightweight, easy to clean, beautiful and come in a set of six so if one breaks, like my last wooden spoon I'll have plenty of replacements. And the bowl is deep enough so that it actually functions as a spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect spoon for Manuka Honey
customer_reviews.text: I found out that wood or plastic spoon is recommended for Manuka honey, which I take every day for medicinal purposes. This spoon is a nice size and has nice, long handle with smooth finishes. These are perfect for everyday uses and I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susie L

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality is great
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn’t realize these spoons were smaller than regular size mixing spoons. Then I started to like them. They are sturdy, look very neat and still can be used in mixing. Perfect for kids whom learn how to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Gosia86

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons set!
customer_reviews.text: Never thought i needed these long handle spoons but i was wrong! It’s super cute and i find myself using it for everything from cooking to using it as eating utensil. Super durable and high quality! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Thien Lam

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable to eat with!!
customer_reviews.text: Saw some wooden spoons being used on a Korean cooking show and decided I wanted to try. I wish these were available years ago. They will be the most comfortable spoons ever used to eat with. Good size. Very lightweight but still very sturdy. Will be ordering some more.
customer_reviews.author: Diahanna Harris

customer_reviews.title: Uniqueness
customer_reviews.text: I have many parties at my home and I enjoy things that are different. My home is rustic so these fit the decor. I use them for cooking, stirring, salads, etc. Iam pleases with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: alice  morrison

customer_reviews.title: These spoon are just what I needed and didn't just want!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I figured i'd give them a go. Getting steel forks. But I don't use spoons enough to get 60. So I got these. Can't clip a tooth. Very nice eating experience prior to a good ole metal spoon. Long handle making it easy to eat without bending your back so much to take easy bites. Worth. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Calvin R

customer_reviews.title: Great soup spoons
customer_reviews.text: I thought that these would be larger due to the description of "long" handle, and I thought they would be cooking spoons. I was wrong. They are perfect for soup and they are so smooth and light, it is a great mouth feel.
customer_reviews.author: Tom E.

customer_reviews.title: Wooden spoons
customer_reviews.text: I bought these spoons for my wife,to replace son that we had for many years. These are well crafted and there will never be any concern about splinters. They do not get distorted when In heat. Wash up is simple and easily accomplished. Easy to handle. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, looks good
customer_reviews.text: These are very good looking spoons that do the job well. They have a higher quality than the traditional boring wooden spoons and they look so much better as well
customer_reviews.author: David J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great lil spoons
customer_reviews.text: These were a little smaller than I expected them to be, but that hasn’t stopped me from using them and they have not disappointed. They’re easy to hold and use and they clean up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!  Be sure to read description.  NOT large wooden spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are many to be gifts and I should have read it better. I was expecting large wooden spoons. These are a bit larger than the average soup spoon length. I am sure my daughter will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: got these for my wife
customer_reviews.text: my wife likes to bake, and she needed wooden spoons to poke holes in bread and cakes, but she also uses this in her ice cream maker when they ice cream done. they are great
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for soup
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try wooden spoons with soup/rice, so I thought I'd give these a try. I really like the smooth mouthfeel and how it doesn't heat up. I hand wash these and drip dry in a cup that drains from the bottom. Love these
customer_reviews.author: Heather H. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Poopy
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box they were chipped and split sent them back
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are my go-to whether for baking, cooking, using it to eat. Does not splinter at all. Super light weight and sturdy. I am very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Kwan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this wooden spoons. Great for cooking and eating with. I was surprised at how much I enjoyed eating a bowl of chili with one of these spoons, completely different feeling than metal spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Sibley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good spoons so far.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad thought they were little to short at first but seems just right. So far had about a month seems to be doing well not chiping or anything yet. Got them mostly so the metal spoon don't scratch the pots & so far so good not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David Rosenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Quite satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought 9-inch spoon this time (right). It’s longer than a normal mug spoon (left) but I do like it. Makes me feel like a Korean style. Since it’s longer, sometimes I can use it to replace spatula for cooking (then I don’t need to wash two things). Here’s a little hint: don’t scoop ice cream or fridge rice with these wooden spoons. My friend broke one when trying to scoop ice cream. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe Shen

customer_reviews.title: Love this spoon set
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons! A little smaller than I expected but I have small hands and I love cooking with them. They have been washed several times and no splinters or anything. This is the their type I bought in the past few weeks & ive had to throw then others away because as soon as they hit water they started to splinter. Very happy and I will continue to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality wooden spoons!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are perfect for all uses. My recommendation is to clean after using in mild soapy water and dry right away. By doing this, you will maintain the wood and its brightness. I've read some negative reviews but found that with proper care these spoons have held up beautifully. I would definitely purchase again for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: BookWorm. Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Wooden soup spoons with long handle
customer_reviews.text: These wooden soup/rice spoons work great and are beautiful. They have long handles and fit great in the hand and are also light weight. My hubby and tried them out today, soup for dinner. No burned lips today.
customer_reviews.author: Maira Navarro

customer_reviews.title: These wooden spoons are great!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first set of wooden spoons. They are light, easy to use, and very useful! They’re so easy to clean too. They are my go-to spoons with practically most of my meals these days. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood spoons with good price
customer_reviews.text: Like these spoons a lot! I always need spoons for my pans and these wood spoon won't hurt the coating. These spoons are sturdy and of really nice quality. Used them for a month and am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jiayi Chen

customer_reviews.title: 6 piece wooden spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are our new favorite spoons. We use them for cooking and eating. Light weight, sturdy, and comfortable to use. Very easy to clean. We definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy of 2019
customer_reviews.text: These are little wonderful kitchen jewels. I had no idea how wonderful these would be. Will buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: Marsha K

customer_reviews.title: Not large
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid closer attention to the size of these spoons. They’re definitely just a soup spoon size. I thought woul be larger. Oh well, my grandkids will enjoy playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia G

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons for the price
customer_reviews.text: These wooden spoons are pretty to look at and functional. They break easy so do not apply a lot of pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Kaley

customer_reviews.title: Larger than your mouth might enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: If you intend to eat with these spoons then know that they are larger than a tablespoon by at least 1 1/2 times and longer as well. For mixing and stirring and anything else they are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great Useful Spoons!
customer_reviews.text: I adore these spoons. Intially, when I received them I was worried they would be too frail. This was proven wrong however, they are very sturdy and a good all purpose size. The light finish on them is amazing and totally eliminates the normal staining and absorption problems of run of the mill cheap wooden spoons. They are suprisingly sturdy and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoons for price.
customer_reviews.text: Really like these little spoons. They are nice and long, which makes it easier to use for certain things. They have held up nicely. My only concern was the shiny finish but it hasn’t been a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chessie

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight..
customer_reviews.text: And the bowl part is a little bigger than it should be, but they're pretty nice. They definitely look the part
customer_reviews.author: theroxx

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I use these spoons every chance I can, anything that you normally use a spoon for. Very pleasant!
customer_reviews.author: F. K. Groening

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: They're the perfect size for cooking and eating with. The coating is smooth, and they're easy to clean. I love the dark color also.
customer_reviews.author: C.H.

customer_reviews.title: I love these little spoons!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little spoons! They are great for stirring up little items. I don’t particularly like eating with them. They are just a tick too big!
customer_reviews.author: Georgiagirl1216

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome can definitely withstand the dishwasher. Can get scuffed up if you scrape the pan but that's with mostly all wooden spoons.
customer_reviews.author: W. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Not long handles
customer_reviews.text: Shorter handle than expected. Other than that they look alright. Will update if there are problems with the finish after some washes.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these spoons!! I use them for soup!!! Perfect!! Easy to clean!!! Will purchase more for gifts!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Well made and pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for cooking mostly but can eat with them as well. Well made. Gave set as gifts too.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Hayes

customer_reviews.title: VERY SMALL spoons
customer_reviews.text: Beware that these are definitely “soup” spoons and not the type of spoons that you would use for “cooking”. They are very small! Unfortunately, I had to return them and order something else because I was looking for a larger spoon. I loved the color of the spoons though & they did seem sturdy & appeared to be good quality so I gave them 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Reyes

product_meta.title: Wooden Spoons, 6 Pieces 9 Inch Wood Soup Spoons for Eating Mixing Stirring, Long Handle Spoon with Japanese Style Kitchen Utensil, ADLORYEA Eco Friendly Table Spoon
feature_bullets: ECO-FRIENDLY NATURAL MATERIAL- Made by Phoebe Nanmu Wood. Each wooden soup spoon is grinded by hand and well-finished with a type of natural plant oil glaze that does not come off. No odor! No BPA & toxic!
BEAUTIFUL DESIGN & UNIQUE GRAIN – Comfortable design with exquisite grain patterns. Wood Grain varies by years and the grow conditions made these handmade table spoons Unique.
EXQUISITE WORKMANSHIP & DURABLE - 9 INCH LENGTH with 12g for each dinner spoons. Very Smoothly, Lightweight but sturdy, No crack! Will last long time even everyday used!

MULTI-FUNCTION - The Tablespoon are the just right & perfect size (not Huge & not small) for Eating, Stirring hot soups, coffee, making your Nasi goreng (fried rice), curries, and other dishes. Eating cereal, rice, Korean or Japanese meals. These wooden kitchen eating utensils are the best when using non-stick cookware, will not scratch up your pots and pans.

What You Get - 6 pieces Wooden Table Spoons are as a set. Giftbox Packaging, perfect household gifts for your family or friends . Friendly Customer Service for this cooking spoon will be count as soon as you bought.
